reviewText: My mother is an Alzheimer's patient in a nursing home.  Wendy Bagwell can make her laugh when nothing else can.  Because her TV had a VHS player in it, I was thrilled to find this and Wendy's "And That's a Fact with My Hand Up!" tape on Amazon at a price that I could afford.  When I visit her, we watch Wendy over and over again and she loves it!
